activities:
We collect first name, last name and email address when a user registers for a Givit personal video sharing account.  Thereafter, that information is used by VMIX solely to verify the identity of the account holder and limit access to the content stored therein to that user. 

VMIX sells add-on product features within the company's iOS application. Proceeds are collected through the Apple iTunes network.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: VMIX commits to cooperate with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
